scenarios.name: Generator Creates Bot Tool For Test Bot
steps: Given A bot configuration file with a working directory and behaviors
And A bot that has been initialized with that config file
When Generator processes Bot Config
Then Generator creates 1 bot tool instance

scenarios.name: Generator Creates Behavior Tools For Test Bot With 4 Behaviors
steps: Given A bot configuration file with a working directory and behaviors
And A bot that has been initialized with that config file
When Generator processes Bot Config
Then Generator creates 4 behavior tool instances

scenarios.name: Generator Creates MCP Server For Test Bot
steps: Given A bot configuration file with a working directory and behaviors
And A bot that has been initialized with that config file
When MCP Server Generator receives Bot Config
Then Generator creates MCP Server instance with unique server name

scenarios.name: Generator fails when Bot Config is missing
steps: Given A bot directory exists
And Bot Config does NOT exist
When MCP Server Generator attempts to receive Bot Config
Then Generator raises FileNotFoundError and does not create MCP Server instance

scenarios.name: Generator fails when Bot Config is malformed
steps: Given A bot directory exists
And Bot Config file exists with invalid JSON syntax
When MCP Server Generator attempts to receive Bot Config
Then Generator raises JSONDecodeError and does not create MCP Server instance

scenarios.name: Generator Creates Tools For Test Bot With 4 Behaviors
steps: Given A bot configuration file with a working directory and behaviors
And Base actions structure exists
And Behavior workflow files exist for all behaviors
When Generator processes Bot Config
Then Generator creates bot tool and 4 behavior tools

scenarios.name: Generator loads trigger words from behavior folder
steps: Given A bot configuration file with a working directory and behaviors
And Behavior has trigger words configured
And A bot that has been initialized with that config file
When Generator creates behavior tool
Then Behavior tool is registered with trigger patterns in description

scenarios.name: Generator handles missing trigger words file
steps: Given A bot configuration file with a working directory and behaviors
And Behavior does not have trigger words configured
And A bot that has been initialized with that config file
When Generator creates behavior tool
Then Behavior tool registered without trigger patterns

scenarios.name: Generator Deploys Server Successfully
steps: Given A bot configuration file with a working directory and behaviors
And Behavior workflow files exist for all behaviors
And A bot that has been initialized with that config file
When Generator deploys MCP Server
Then Server initializes and publishes tool catalog

scenarios.name: Server Publishes Tool Catalog With Metadata
steps: Given A bot configuration file with a working directory and behaviors
And Behavior has trigger words configured
And A bot that has been initialized with that config file
When Server publishes catalog
Then Catalog entry includes all metadata

scenarios.name: Generator Fails When Protocol Handler Not Running
steps: Given A bot configuration file with a working directory and behaviors
And A bot that has been initialized with that config file
And MCP Protocol Handler is not running
When Generator attempts to deploy
Then Raises ConnectionError

scenarios.name: Server Handles Initialization Failure
steps: Given A bot directory exists
And Bot Config does NOT exist
When Server thread starts
Then Logs error and does not register

stories.name: Restart MCP Server To Load Code Changes

scenarios.name: Clear Python bytecode cache removes all __pycache__ directories and .pyc files
steps: Given __pycache__ directories exist with .pyc files
When clear_python_cache is called
Then All __pycache__ directories are removed
And All .pyc files are deleted

scenarios.name: Find MCP Server Processes
steps: Given MCP server processes may or may not be running
When Finding MCP server processes
Then Function returns valid processes list (may be empty if no servers running)

scenarios.name: Generator creates workspace rules file with trigger patterns
steps: Given A bot configuration file with a working directory and behaviors
And Behaviors have trigger words configured
And A bot that has been initialized with that config file
When Generator runs generate_awareness_files() method
Then Generator creates file with bot-specific filename: mcp-test-bot-awareness.mdc
And Filename includes bot name with hyphens
And Generated rules file includes ACTUAL trigger words from bot
And File includes bot name from config

scenarios.name: Rules file includes bot goal and behavior descriptions
steps: Given Bot has instructions.json with goal and behavior descriptions
When Generator creates .cursor/rules/mcp-<bot-name>-awareness.mdc file
Then File includes bot's goal from instructions.json
And Critical rule mentions bot's goal: "When user is trying to [goal], check MCP tools FIRST"
And Each behavior section includes "When user is trying to [behavior description]"

scenarios.name: Rules file maps trigger patterns to tool naming conventions
steps: Given A bot configuration file with a working directory and behaviors
And Behaviors have trigger words configured
And A bot that has been initialized with that config file
When File is written to .cursor/rules/mcp-test-bot-awareness.mdc
Then Each behavior section includes tool pattern with ACTUAL bot name
And Tool patterns appear in behavior sections (not flat list)

scenarios.name: Generator handles file write errors gracefully creates directory
steps: Given MCP Server Generator attempts to create awareness files
When .cursor/rules/ directory does not exist
Then Generator creates directory before writing file
And File write succeeds with bot-specific filename

scenarios.name: Generator handles file write errors with clear error message
steps: Given .cursor/rules/ directory is write-protected
When Generator attempts to write file
Then Generator raises clear error message indicating permission issue
And Error includes bot-specific path attempted

scenarios.name: Full awareness generation workflow
steps: Given MCP Server Generator initialized
When generate_awareness_files() called
Then Bot-specific rules file is created
And Rules file has all required sections

scenarios.name: Tool Invokes Behavior Action When Called
steps: Given Bot has behavior 'shape' with action 'gather_context'
When AI Chat invokes tool with parameters
Then Tool routes to test_bot.Shape.GatherContext() method

scenarios.name: Tool Routes To Correct Behavior Action Method
steps: Given Bot has multiple behaviors with build_knowledge action
When AI Chat invokes 'test_bot_exploration_build_knowledge'
Then Tool routes to test_bot.Exploration.BuildKnowledge() not other behaviors

stories.name: Load And Merge Behavior Action Instructions

scenarios.name: Action Loads And Merges Instructions
steps: Given Base and behavior-specific instructions exist
When Action method is invoked
Then Instructions are loaded from both locations and merged

stories.name: Forward To Current Behavior and Current Action

scenarios.name: Bot tool forwards to current behavior and current action
steps: Given workflow state shows current_behavior='discovery', current_action='build_knowledge'
When Bot tool receives invocation
Then Bot tool forwards to correct behavior and action

scenarios.name: Bot tool defaults to first behavior and first action when state missing
steps: Given workflow state does NOT exist
When Bot tool receives invocation
Then Bot tool defaults to first behavior and first action

scenarios.name: Behavior tool forwards to current action within behavior
steps: Given a behavior tool for 'discovery' behavior
And workflow state shows current_action='build_knowledge'
When Behavior tool receives invocation
Then Behavior tool forwards to build_knowledge action

scenarios.name: Behavior tool sets workflow to current behavior when state shows different behavior
steps: Given a behavior tool for 'exploration' behavior
And workflow state shows current_behavior='discovery'
When Behavior tool receives invocation
Then workflow state updated to current_behavior='exploration'

scenarios.name: Behavior tool defaults to first action when state missing
steps: Given a behavior tool for 'shape' behavior
And workflow state does NOT exist
When Behavior tool receives invocation
Then Behavior tool defaults to first action

scenarios.name: Action called directly saves workflow state
steps: Given Bot is initialized with WORKING_AREA set
And No workflow state exists yet
When Action is called directly (e.g., bot.shape.gather_context())
Then workflow_state.json is created with current_behavior and current_action
And This ensures state is saved whether action is called via forward or directly

stories.name: Get Help for Command Line Functions

scenarios.name: Trigger bot only (no behavior or action specified)
steps: Given user types message containing trigger words
And bot is at specific behavior and action from workflow state
When Extension intercepts user message
Then Extension identifies target bot from trigger patterns
And Extension routes to bot using current behavior and action from state
And CLI executes current behavior and action

scenarios.name: Trigger bot and behavior (no action specified)
steps: Given user types message containing behavior-specific trigger words
And behavior is at specific action from workflow state
When Extension intercepts user message
Then Extension identifies bot and behavior from trigger patterns
And Extension routes to behavior using current action from state
And CLI executes behavior with current action

scenarios.name: Trigger bot, behavior, and action explicitly
steps: Given user types message containing action-specific trigger words
When Extension intercepts user message
Then Extension identifies bot, behavior, and action from trigger patterns
And Extension routes directly to specified action
And CLI executes specified action

scenarios.name: Trigger close current action
steps: Given user types message containing close trigger words
And bot is at specific behavior and action from workflow state
When Extension intercepts user message
Then Extension identifies close action from trigger patterns
And Extension routes to close_current_action
And CLI closes current action and advances workflow

scenarios.name: Close current action and transition to next
Close action when already at final action
Close final action and transition to next behavior
Close action that requires confirmation but wasn't confirmed
Close Current Action Marks Complete And Transitions
Bot Class Has Close Current Action Method
Close Action At Final Action Stays At Final
Close Final Action Transitions To Next Behavior
Close Action Saves To Completed Actions List
Close Handles Action Already Completed Gracefully

stories.name: Invoke Behavior Actions In Workflow Order

scenarios.name: Complete Workflow End To End
Action Loads Context Data Into Instructions
steps: Given A clarification.json file exists with data for multiple behaviors
And A strategy.json file exists with data for multiple behaviors
And A docs/context/ folder exists with input.txt and other files
And An Action is initialized
When Action loads and merges instructions
Then Instructions contain 'clarification' key with all clarification data
And Instructions contain 'strategy' key with all strategy data
And Instructions contain 'context_files' key with list of file names
And Base instructions include explanation of clarification data
And Base instructions include explanation of strategy data
And Base instructions include explanation of context files
And Context file contents are NOT loaded into instructions
When No clarification.json file exists
Then Instructions do NOT contain 'clarification' key and no error is raised
When No strategy.json file exists
Then Instructions do NOT contain 'strategy' key and no error is raised
When No docs/context/ folder exists
Then Instructions do NOT contain 'context_files' key and no error is raised

stories.name: Track Activity for Gather Context Action

scenarios.name: Track activity when gather_context action starts
steps: Given behavior is 'discovery' and action is 'gather_context'
When gather_context action starts execution
Then Activity logger creates entry with timestamp and action_state

scenarios.name: Track activity when gather_context action completes
steps: Given gather_context action started
When gather_context action finishes execution
Then Activity logger creates completion entry with outputs and duration

scenarios.name: Track multiple gather_context invocations across behaviors
steps: Given activity log contains entries for shape and discovery
When both entries are present
Then activity log distinguishes same action in different behaviors using full path

scenarios.name: Seamless transition from gather_context to decide_planning_criteria
steps: Given gather_context action is complete
When workflow transitions
Then Workflow proceeds to decide_planning_criteria

scenarios.name: Workflow state captures gather_context completion
steps: Given gather_context action completes

scenarios.name: Workflow resumes at decide_planning_criteria after interruption
steps: Given gather_context is completed and chat was interrupted
When user reopens chat and invokes bot tool
Then Workflow auto-forwards to decide_planning_criteria action

stories.name: Gather Context Saves To Context Folder

Action Uses Base Planning When Guardrails Missing

steps: Given Base and behavior-specific instructions exist

scenarios.name: Action Uses Base Instructions When Behavior Instructions Missing
steps: Given Base instructions exist but behavior-specific instructions do not
When Action method is invoked
Then Only base instructions are returned (no behavior_instructions key)

scenarios.name: All Template Variables Are Replaced In Instructions
steps: Given Base instructions with {{rules}}, {{schema}}, {{description}}, {{instructions}} placeholders
When Action loads and merges instructions with all injections
Then All template variables are replaced with actual content

When Action loads and merges instructions with all injections

scenarios.name: Formatted render_configs includes all fields referenced in instructions
steps: Given Render configs with instructions, synchronizer, template, input, output fields
When Configs are formatted for injection
Then All fields are present in formatted output

scenarios.name: Track Activity When Render Output Action Starts
Activity Log Creates File If Not Exists
steps: Given workspace directory exists but no activity log
When Action tracks activity
Then Activity log file is created automatically

scenarios.name: Track Activity When Render Output Action Completes
Track Multiple Render Output Invocations Across Behaviors
Seamless Transition From Validate Rules To Render Output
Workflow State Captures Render Output Completion
Render Output Action Executes Successfully
steps: Given render_output action is initialized
When Action is executed
Then Action completes without errors

stories.name: Track Activity for Validate Rules Action

scenarios.name: Track activity when validate_rules action starts
steps: Given behavior is 'exploration' and action is 'validate_rules'
When validate_rules action starts execution
Then Activity logger creates entry with timestamp and action_state

scenarios.name: Activity Log Maintains Chronological Order
steps: Given activity log contains 10 previous action entries
When validate_rules entry is appended
Then New entry appears at end of log in chronological order

scenarios.name: Track activity when validate_rules action completes
steps: Given validate_rules action started at timestamp
When validate_rules action finishes execution
Then Activity logger creates completion entry with outputs and duration

steps: Given activity log contains entries for shape and exploration validate_rules
When both entries are present
Then activity log distinguishes same action in different behaviors

steps: Given Violations have been detected
